title: L'Oasis Italiana
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Traditional Italian with a large choice of vegetarian dishes. Almost half of the pizzas are vegetarian and can be made vegan by omitting cheese. Most pasta dishes are also vegetarian and several are vegan (spaghetti pomodoro, penne arrabbiata, pasta primavera). Staff are knowledgeable about vegans and dishes can be prepared as required.
streetAddress: Rua D Joao Il Lj 1 r/c Edificio Atlantico IV
